backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining session, messaging, document, and image types with storage, authorization mixins, and state counters for IDs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles to new ones by adding an optional profilePicture field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light and dark theme OKLCH color variables and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint initializing theme mode early from localStorage and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app logic handling authentication, profile setup, session restoration, routing, and global preference application.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Chat view component that displays messages, auto-scrolls, and handles sending regular or dice-roll messages via actor calls.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders an individual chat message with avatar, timestamp, and roll highlighting, resolving user profile data for avatars.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Host-facing document editor with locking, revision display, save handling, and error/readonly states.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Player document editor that loads a document, enforces visibility and ownership, and saves edits when allowed.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Displays a user avatar with fallback initials and auto-handling of broken image URLs.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Manages profile picture upload/removal with validation, progress tracking, and update actions via profile hooks.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting channels using actor calls, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: Provides dialogs for creating, renaming, deleting, and locking documents, interacting with the backend through the actor API.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: Implements session export and import UI for hosts, including file parsing, confirmation dialogs, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Contains dialogs and menu actions for players to create, rename, delete, and toggle visibility of their own documents using custom hooks.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Renders the session sidebar listing channels and documents with host-only management actions and create dialogs.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: Settings screen allowing users to configure preferences such as theme, background, nickname, and load or clear templates.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling intervals for various periodic data refresh operations.
Provides a React context for user preferences with persistence, theme syncing, and reset functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, logging in, and clearing identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: Defines React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, editing, renaming, deleting, and updating visibility of player documents via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: Implements a simple polling hook that repeatedly invokes a callback at a specified interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re-exports usePreferences from the PreferencesContext for compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: Fetches session, channels, documents, messages, and selected document data with polling using React Query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and updating user profiles, including caller and arbitrary users, with React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color palettes and base typography.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Parses, creates, inserts, and removes image marker tokens within document text content.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Loads, saves, and resets user preferences in localStorage with default fallback values.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Validates basic dice roll command patterns and returns simple validation results.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Creates, downloads, and parses session export JSON files with version validation.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears session context data in localStorage.
Saves, loads, clears, and validates session template data in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into user-friendly strings, showing only time for today and full date/time otherwise.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root and wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Provides host/join session forms, applies templates on host creation, and triggers session joining or logout.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: Displays the active session with sidebar navigation, channel or document views, and session/member info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Contains project state metadata, architectural notes, issues, and existing feature definitions for the app.
